## Description {#details}

Performs the legality analysis and returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/legalityresult">LegalityResult</a> object.

## Public Member Functions

### canVectorize() {#a5c81ada05bd736617bf16b24329360b8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>const LegalityResult &amp; llvm::sandboxir::LegalityAnalysis::canVectorize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Bndl, bool SkipScheduling=false)</>}>
Checks if it&#39;s legal to vectorize the instructions in <code>Bndl</code>.

\\Returns a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/legalityresult">LegalityResult</a> object owned by <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/legalityanalysis">LegalityAnalysis</a>. <code>SkipScheduling</code> skips the scheduler check and is only meant for testing.

## Private Member Functions

### getHowToCollectValues() {#a497ee83222d0bbf6e4b557bd98298ee5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>CollectDescr llvm::sandboxir::LegalityAnalysis::getHowToCollectValues (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/value">Value</a> &#42; &gt; Bndl) const</>}>
Finds how we can collect the values in <code>Bndl</code> from the vectorized or non-vectorized code.

It returns a map of the value we should extract from and the corresponding shuffle mask we need to use.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/legality-h/#l00327">327</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/include/llvm/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/legality-h">Legality.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/legality-cpp/#l00194">194</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/vectorize/lib/transforms/vectorize/sandboxvectorizer/legality-cpp">Legality.cpp</a>.
